column2: GM discovers new ignition switch issue
column4: 300 vehicles -AP Oct 16 General Motors Co has discovered another ignition switch problem among its pickup trucks and SUVs that can cause engines to stall
column5: but it was discovered before anyone was hurt

column2: UPDATE 4-IBM says some governments allowed to review its source code SAN FRANCISCO
column3: Oct 16 International Business Machines Corp said on Friday it allows certain countries to review
column5: portions of the U.S. technology company's product source code to detect any security flaws in its software. ~
